Text:
GREAT UP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Yeah this guy is INSANE, SOOOO HAPPY you upped this dj_shoo.
I have the DVD of Modern Drummer 2005 and have been trying to get the audio ripped from it, no need now. Check out "far". Insane.

fudge yeah! i wasn't into breakbeat stuff until i saw him play it, now it's one of my favourite styles to play on drums!

i wish someone would upload his instructional drum DVD!
thank you so much jojo is sooo sick!

Jojo is the best. Period. 
Thanks for the upload!
